Text: I typed February 25th in the description, but it is indeed the FEBRUARY 26TH UPDATE. Sorry for the confusion.
Mac instructions work perfectly - haven't needed to check "Load out of date addons" for any of your releases.  Thanks!
Thank you for the Mac feeback. I will amend that section next update.
My archy addon (for archaeology) doesn't work with this zygor guide. I have to use the old version zygor guide in order to make the addon work. Can you please fix this?
No working... dont have seeders... i whait for 2 days....

There are plenty of seeders, and the addon works just fine. As for Archy, I obviously can't fix Zygor to work with it as I don't make Zygor. 

You'll probably have to wait for a fix from Zygor that I'll post here after release.
How are you able to upload everytime theres an update?
I can continually post the updates here thanks to the glory that is the internet. I'm just spreading the awesome around. :P
